Inhabiting the Hack

The Hacks About CCN+

18 Jul 2015
Wrekshop

This hack was a “Wrekshop” lead by performance artist Paul Granjon, taking redundant technology apart, and reconstructing it as something new.

Paul Granjon is an electronic artist who makes robots and other machines for performances and installations. Paul is interested in the co-evolution of humans and machines. A fervent advocate of creative techno making fun, he believes that people need to get their hands dirty with technology, understand that it is crucial to consume less of it and know more about how it works. He disseminates his ideas and unique upcycling techniques in Wrekshops that involve people, electronic waste, digital fabrication and open-source electronics. He is currently working on a song on electricity, to be performed off-grid. In collaboration with Access Space as well as Paul Granjon.

The Hacks About CCN+
